title: The State of Being Love: Steps to Raise Your Vibration for a Joy Filled Life
description: The state of Being Love has one of the highest vibrations that you can hope to experience in life. Itâ€™s a vibration much higher than sadness, guilt, despair, anger, hatred, self-doubt, worry, judgement and fear. It begins with small steps to get to moments in your daily life that raise your vibration as you move toward a heart overflowing with unconditional love. Then the magic begins. You feel better and look younger than you have in years as you experience a world more amazing then you can possibly imagine. The author laughs as she tells audiences that she initially called it her happiness self help and free natural botox formula. In this book you will discover how to identify the patterns to remove negativity in you life, how to release negative emotions like anger, sadness, fear and guilt and live each day filled with joy.  Recent Book RADIO INTERVIEW: http://goo.gl/lCck9F "As the author, I had to do a lot of soul searching as I wrote this book, deciding how many of the stories describing my faults and challenges I wanted the world to know. There's a difference between sharing a single story in front of hundreds in the audiences where I appear, but so many intimate details was something else. I concluded that I had to share my hurts, my fears and my not so wise decisions so others know that they are not alone as I teach them how to eliminate fear from their lives by raising their vibration and moving forward." Blessings, LeeZa Donatella
author: Leeza Donatella
